load the dplyr and ggplot2 packages for daya wrangling visualization

```{r}
library(dplyr)
library(ggplot2)
```

```{r}
gapminder<-read.csv("https://stat.duke.edu/~mc301/data/gapminder.csv")
```
Filter for 2007
```{r}
gap07<-gapminder%>%
filter(year==2007)
```
Graphed data
```{r}
qplot(x=gdpPercap, y=lifeExp, data=gap07)
```
